author: ykunze
title: Hip hotel in NY - Review
text:
This was our first stay at any Standard. The staff was very nice, the hotel is very hip and trendy and has a cool cafe and a restaurant. If you are visiting for business or pleasure in this area its a nice place to stay.
Room Tip: The corner rooms are the best See more room tips
